Body: I have a USB adapter to pick up internet on my desktop and an external hard drive through USB, and they stop responding immediately after I plug in either android phone, I have to restart after this happens because the wireless internet options never regain function until reboot.  I have an iPhone which works just fine when I plug it in to my computer. I initially had USB Debugging on when I noticed this issue, so I turned it off, rebooted and tried again with same results. I have the latest software for both devices.Suggestions?
Title: When I plug in Samsung Skyrocket & Moto Atrix to Windows 7 my USB ports stop working

history.Text: I have a USB adapter to pick up internet on my desktop and an external hard drive through USB, and they stop responding immediately after I plug in either android phone, I have to restart after this happens because the wireless internet options never regain function until reboot.  I have an iPhone which works just fine when I plug it in to my computer. I initially had USB Debugging on when I noticed this issue, so I turned it off, rebooted and tried again with same results. I have the latest software for both devices.Suggestions?
When I plug in Samsung Skyrocket & Moto Atrix to Windows 7 my USB ports stop working
